name: Rescue Rangers
description:
W,A,S,D / arrow-keys for movement, shift for 'running'.

Firefox seems to work much better than chrome.

The beatcavern is almost unplayable in browers at least when I tried it in firefox and chrome.

Fish are friends, not food!

Some of our little friends are lost and need help finding their way back.

Can you pickup all coins along the way and get the secret treasure ?

Play as one of three unique characters of the (underwater) Rescue Rangers.

Currently 8 levels  +  a bonus dance level !

I will definitely continue to work on this project when the jam is over.

Adding enemies that chase you, upgrades to buy with coins and more complex levels.

The beatcave could turn into a game itself but I like the idea of having an alternate way of earning coins to become stronger.
